comments:
If you try to run the applications 'sitebuilders' and 'ifile' as defined in the plugin.xml,
you will get the following:

java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException: java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: Application not found: org.eclipse.core.examples.resources.sitebuilders

	at org.eclipse.core.boot.BootLoader.run(BootLoader.java:285)
	at java.lang.reflect.Method.invoke(Native Method)
	at org.eclipse.core.launcher.Main.basicRun(Main.java:126)
	at org.eclipse.core.launcher.Main.run(Main.java:471)
	at org.eclipse.core.launcher.UIMain.main(UIMain.java:52)


NOTES:
Work on Examples will be done LATER.
